content: I think I'll start by using a habit tracker app to track my exercise routine, meal planning, and cooking sessions. I'll also try to take progress photos of my meals and workouts to visualize my progress. Additionally, I'll set reminders on my phone to reflect on my progress every Sunday and make adjustments to my routine as needed. I like the idea of celebrating milestones, so I'll set small rewards for myself when I reach certain milestones, like completing a certain number of workouts or cooking a certain number of meals at home.
